items.title: Awesome Security
items.content_text:
### Terminal / Development

*   [shellclear (‚≠ê225)](https://github.com/rusty-ferris-club/shellclear) - It helps you to Secure your shell history commands by finding sensitive commands in your all history commands and allowing you to clean them.

Terminal / Development

items.title: Awesome Lit
items.content_text:
### Design Systems

*   [AXA Pattern Library (‚≠ê126)](https://github.com/axa-ch-webhub-cloud/pattern-library) - AXA CH UI components library built with LitElement.
*   [Carbon Web Components (‚≠ê476)](https://github.com/carbon-design-system/carbon-web-components) - Carbon Design System variant on top of Web Components.
*   [Clarity Core Web Components (‚≠ê178)](https://github.com/vmware-clarity/core/tree/main/projects/core) - Suite of web components for Clarity Design System.
*   [Momentum UI Web Components (‚≠ê211)](https://github.com/momentum-design/momentum-ui/tree/master/web-components) - Set of UI components based on Momentum Design.
*   [Red Hat Design System (‚≠ê122)](https://github.com/RedHat-UX/red-hat-design-system) - Web components for building uniform experiences with the Red Hat brand.
items.content_html:
Design Systems

  • AXA Pattern Library (‚≠ê126) - AXA CH UI components library built with LitElement.
  • Carbon Web Components (‚≠ê476) - Carbon Design System variant on top of Web Components.
  • Clarity Core Web Components (‚≠ê178) - Suite of web components for Clarity Design System.
  • Momentum UI Web Components (‚≠ê211) - Set of UI components based on Momentum Design.
  • Red Hat Design System (‚≠ê122) - Web components for building uniform experiences with the Red Hat brand.

items.title: Free Podcasts/Screencasts (English)
items.content_text:
### HTML and CSS

*   [CSS Crash Course For Absolute Beginners](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yfoY53QXEnI) - Brad Traversy (screencast)
*   [CSS-Tricks Screencasts](https://css-tricks.com/video-screencasts/) - Chris Coyier (screencast)
*   [The CSS Podcast](https://thecsspodcast.libsyn.com) - Una Kravets, Adam Argyle (podcast)
items.content_html:

items.title: Awesome Micropython
items.content_text:
### Shells / On Host

*   [mpremote (‚≠ê21k)](https://github.com/micropython/micropython/blob/master/tools/mpremote/README.md) - Powerful official shell that supports mounting the host's current directory on the target. Run code without changing the target's filesystem.
items.content_html:
Shells / On Host

  • mpremote (‚≠ê21k) - Powerful official shell that supports mounting the host's current directory on the target. Run code without changing the target's filesystem.

items.title: Awesome Django
items.content_text:
### Third-Party Packages / Configuration

*   [dynaconf](https://www.dynaconf.com/django/) - Dynaconf loads django settings from multiple sources (multiple file formats, env vars, redis, vault, etcd), manages secrets, and allows for different merging strategies all following [the twelve-factor app](https://12factor.net/config).

### Third-Party Packages / Task Queues

*   [django-dramatiq (‚≠ê365)](https://github.com/Bogdanp/django_dramatiq) - Task processing library with a focus on simplicity, reliability, and performance.

### Projects / Open Source Projects

*   [Flagsmith (‚≠ê5.8k)](https://github.com/Flagsmith/flagsmith) - Open-source Feature Flagging, Remote Config, and AB testing.
items.content_html:
Third-Party Packages / Configuration

  • dynaconf - Dynaconf loads django settings from multiple sources (multiple file formats, env vars, redis, vault, etcd), manages secrets, and allows for different merging strategies all following the twelve-factor app.

Third-Party Packages / Task Queues

  • django-dramatiq (‚≠ê365) - Task processing library with a focus on simplicity, reliability, and performance.

Projects / Open Source Projects

  • Flagsmith (‚≠ê5.8k) - Open-source Feature Flagging, Remote Config, and AB testing.
